comments:
Build ID: tptpaide-2007-03-01-11-19-17

Steps To Reproduce:
1.Create new default mrt i,e new_file.mrt
2.Add all standard capabilities to new_file.mrt file and double click on the Notificationproducer capability, so that it opens up in the editor
3.Go to Operations tab and select any of the operations, error throws up
4.like this error throws up to below standard caps also 
get,set,query,Immediateresourceterminatin,scheduledresourcetermination,
 
check the below error
